Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: フェニア
Entry.EnglishText: Fenia

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 焔の塔・九階
Entry.EnglishText: Burning Tower - 9F

Entry.JapaneseText: フェニアの聖殿・九階
Entry.EnglishText: Shrine of Fenia - 9F

Entry.JapaneseText: 焔の塔・九階
Entry.EnglishText: Burning Tower - 9F

Entry.JapaneseText: フェニアの聖殿・九階
Entry.EnglishText: Shrine of Fenia - 9F

Entry.JapaneseText: よくここまでたどり着きましたね。 さあ、最後の扉を開くのです。 あなたの炎で……
Entry.EnglishText: I see that you have arrived at last. Now it is time to unlock the final gate. Use your fire...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……みんな下がってて。 いっくヨー!!
Entry.EnglishText: Step back, guys. Here I go!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ようこそ…… いえ、おかえりなさい…… 私は火の聖獣フェニア。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome... Or rather, welcome back. I am the Sacred Beast Fenia.

Entry.JapaneseText: おかえりなさい？ どういう事だ……？
Entry.EnglishText: "Welcome back?" What do you mean?

Entry.JapaneseText: お久しぶりですね、 オルセルグ……
Entry.EnglishText: It has been so long, hasn't it? My Olselge...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……オルセルグ？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Olselge?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたの本当の名前です。 古代カレギア語で 「けがれなき瞳」という意味です。
Entry.EnglishText: That is your true name. In ancient Callegean, it means "Unclouded Eyes."

Entry.JapaneseText: けがれなき瞳……オルセルグ…… なんだかピンと来ないんですけど…… <Cyan><Mao><White>って呼んでもらっても…… ……いいかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Unclouded Eyes... Olselge... That doesn't exactly ring a bell. Would it be okay if you just...called me <Cyan><Mao><White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Mao>…… 今、私はあなただけに 話しかけています。
Entry.EnglishText: ...<Mao>... At present, I am speaking to you alone.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ボクだけに？
Entry.EnglishText: Just me?

Entry.JapaneseText: 思い出しましたか？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you remember anything?

Entry.JapaneseText: う、うん…… 思い出したっていうか、 ボクには、もともと 記憶がなかったんだね……
Entry.EnglishText: Y-Yeah... Or rather, I've realized that there's nothing for me to remember...

Entry.JapaneseText: そう……あなたは私たち聖獣が <Yellow>ヒト<White>の世界を見るために 力を合わせて生み出した存在。
Entry.EnglishText: Indeed. You are a creation brought forth by the combined powers of the Sacred Beasts so that we may see the world of <Yellow>Man<White> through your eyes.

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクって、<Yellow>ヒト<White>でもなければ、 聖獣でもないんだよね…… ボクって一体、何なの？
Entry.EnglishText: Wait, so I'm not a Sacred Beast, and I'm not <Yellow>Human<White> either... Then what in the world am I?

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、 私はあなたに尋ねたのです。 あなたは誰ですか……と。
Entry.EnglishText: That is precisely why I am asking, "Who are you?"

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクがボクの存在について 決めろってコト？ ……そんなのできないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: So you mean I'm supposed to determine just what I am? I can't do that!

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜできないのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Why can you not?

Entry.JapaneseText: 当たり前でしょ？ 今までボクは<Yellow>ヒト<White>だと 思ってたんだヨ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Isn't it obvious? I thought I was a plain old <Yellow>Human<White> this entire time!

Entry.JapaneseText: いきなり、<Yellow>違う存在<White>だなんて 思えないよ……
Entry.EnglishText: To suddenly have to think of myself as <Yellow>something else<White> just doesn't seem possible...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうして、 そう思えないのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Why do you think that it is not possible?

Entry.JapaneseText: うーん……どうしてって言われても、 当たり前すぎて、そんなの 考えたコトもなかったし……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, how could I, you know? I've never thought of something so out there...

Entry.JapaneseText: うまく言えないけど…… 正体がわかっても、 ボクはボクのコトを ボクだって思うし……
Entry.EnglishText: It's hard to put this into words, but... Even if I do know what I really am, I'm always going to just think of myself as "me."

Entry.JapaneseText: ん……もしかして、 その辺に答があるのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Hm? ...Am I on the right track, you think?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>…… あなたは賢い子ですね。
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>... You are a wise boy.

Entry.JapaneseText: あのさ……さっきの質問だけど、 今すぐ答を決めないとダメ？
Entry.EnglishText: Um, hey... About your question, do I have to give you an answer right now?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……いいえ。 答は決めるものではありません。 自ずと導き出されるもの。 私はいつまでも待ちます。
Entry.EnglishText: ...No. The answer is not something you decide. It will come to you naturally. I will wait as long as it takes.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、そうすると 聖獣の力を貸してくれない、 なんてコトにはならない？
Entry.EnglishText: But does that mean you won't lend me your power unless I give you an answer, or something?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたが必要とするなら、 私は喜んで力を貸しましょう。
Entry.EnglishText: If you are in need of it, I will gladly lend my strength to you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ただし、 心に迷いを抱いたまま力を使えば、 <Red>火の力<White>があなたを焼き尽くすでしょう。
Entry.EnglishText: However, if you wield this <Red>Power of Flames<White> with a heart full of doubt, you shall be reduced to ashes.

Entry.JapaneseText: それでも、 私の力を求めますか？
Entry.EnglishText: Knowing that, do you still seek my power?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん。 ボクにはやるべきコトがあるし、 みんなと一緒に<Blue>思念<White>を消そうって 約束したから……だから……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah. There's something I gotta do. I promised everyone that I'd help them erase the <Blue>Will<White>, so... Please...

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクは…… 聖獣フェニアの力を求める!!
Entry.EnglishText: Sacred Beast Fenia... Grant me your power!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……では、フォルスを。
Entry.EnglishText: Very well. Manifest your Force...

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ、受け取りなさい。 <Red>火の力<White>を。
Entry.EnglishText: Now take the <Red>Power of Flames<White> unto yourself.

Entry.JapaneseText: ナニコレ……すごいよ、この力…… 気を抜いたら、すぐにボクが 燃えちゃいそうだヨ……
Entry.EnglishText: What is this...? It's a tremendous power... It's like I'll burst into flames if I slip up!

Entry.JapaneseText: これに負けない心の力が必要なんだね…… <Blue>思念<White>を浄化するっていうのは、 それだけ大変なコトなんだネ。
Entry.EnglishText: I have to be strong willed in order to handle it, right? I guess this just proves how tough it's going to be to purify the <Blue>Will<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>、パワーアップ!! ……の巻!!
Entry.EnglishText: Thus closes another chapter of <Mao> powering up!

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣フェニアからもらったヨ！ 熱い力をネ!!!
Entry.EnglishText: Fenia lent me her flaming hot power!

Entry.JapaneseText: なあ……今、一体、 何を話してたんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: So... What were you guys even talking about just now?

Entry.JapaneseText: それはえっと…… イロイロ……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, uh...stuff.

Entry.JapaneseText: もしかして、 記憶を取り戻したのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Does that mean that your memory has come back to you?

Entry.JapaneseText: う、うん……
Entry.EnglishText: Um, yeah...

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ!? じゃあ、ホントの名前とか 家族とか、わかったのかよ？
Entry.EnglishText: Eh?! Then you know what your real name is and who your family are now?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん……でも、今は何も言えない。 しばらくは<Mao>のままでいるコトに するヨ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yep... But I can't tell you anything just yet. I'm going to keep going as "Mao" for a little while longer.

Entry.JapaneseText: どういうこったい？
Entry.EnglishText: What does THAT mean?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そういうこったい!!
Entry.EnglishText: It means what it means!

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣フェニア、 私にも力を与えて！
Entry.EnglishText: Sacred Beast Fenia, grant me your power as well!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私の力を、あなたに 与える事はできません。
Entry.EnglishText: That is something which I am unable to do.

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜ？ なぜ私じゃダメなの!? 私には力が必要なのに……
Entry.EnglishText: Why not? Why am I not worthy!? I need your power in order to...

Entry.JapaneseText: 次の聖獣への道を 示しましょう。
Entry.EnglishText: Allow me to show you the way to the next Sacred Beast.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>「雲海にそびえし古の塔をめざせ」<White>
Entry.EnglishText: "<Cyan>Seek the ancient tower which soars above the sea of clouds.<White>"

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>雲海にそびえし古の塔<White>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Cyan>The ancient tower which soars above a sea of clouds<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 目を逸らさずに、 現実と真実を見つめる事です。 そこにあなたたちの進むべき道が 見つかるはずです。
Entry.EnglishText: You must keep looking toward reality and truth, never averting your gaze. By doing so, you shall find the path you must take.

Entry.JapaneseText: 皆さん……どうか、 この子を導いてください。
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone, please bring guidance to this child.

Entry.JapaneseText: まるで、 親みたいな言い方だな？
Entry.EnglishText: You know, that almost sounds like something a parent would say.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだよ。 だって、フェニアは ボクのお母さんなんだもん!!
Entry.EnglishText: That's true. I mean, Fenia IS my mom!

Entry.JapaneseText: ええーッ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Ehhhhh!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なんてネ!! さあ、出発だ!!
Entry.EnglishText: ...Or something like that! Okay, let's get going!

Entry.JapaneseText: オルセルグ……いいえ、<Mao>。 私はいつでもあなたを見守っています。
Entry.EnglishText: Olselge...no, <Mao>. I will always be watching over you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……うん、行ってきます……
Entry.EnglishText: Got it. I'll be going now.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><Mao>は 奥義『ブレイジングハーツ』が 習得可能になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><Mao> can now learn the Fusion Force 'Blazing Hearts'.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><Red>称号喪失<Green>があったため、<Mao>の称号が <Cyan>「<item:10000017>」<Green>にセットされました。 称号の再変更はステータス画面で行って下さい。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Because <Mao> <Red>lost his title<Green>, it has been set to <Cyan><item:10000017><Green>. You may change it back on the Status screen.
Entry.Notes: it was set to Skill User. he lost the title Amnesiac Boy

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: ……前に来た時には、 こんなものはなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: There wasn't anything the last time we were here...
Entry.Notes: I believe dialogue changes on character - this one's Veigue

Entry.JapaneseText: ラッキー!! 前に来た時には 何もなかったのに！
Entry.EnglishText: It's my lucky day! There wasn't anything the last time we were here!

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……以前、ここには 何もなかったと思うが……
Entry.EnglishText: Hm... I don't think there was anything the last time we were here...

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか、こんなところに…… とても意外な感じね。
Entry.EnglishText: I never expected to find something here, of all places...

Entry.JapaneseText: おう、こんなとこに発見が！ おどろき桃の木だぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, would you look at that! To think I'd discover something here!

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなところに…… そう、こんな事もあるのね。
Entry.EnglishText: How'd this get here...? Well, I guess things like that just happen.

Entry.JapaneseText: 初めてのアイテム会話
Entry.EnglishText: First Time Item Conversation

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、 何か見つかる場合が あるという事か……
Entry.EnglishText: I guess this means you can still find things in places you've already been...

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行ったところでも、 調べに行ったら、 新しい発見があるかもネ！
Entry.EnglishText: We might be able to discover things in other places that we've already been to!

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、 新しい発見があるかもしれんな。
Entry.EnglishText: I suppose we might find things in places that we've already visited.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、こうやって 調べたら何かみつかるかも……？
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps we can find new things if we explore places we've already been...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 前に行った場所でも、 もういっぺん行ってみたら、 何か見つかるかもしれないな！
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe we can find new things in other places we've been to too!

Entry.JapaneseText: 行った事がある場所でも、 もう一度調べたら、何か見つかる かもしれないって事ね……
Entry.EnglishText: We might be able to find things in other places we've been to if we stop by them again...

Entry.JapaneseText: 初めてのアイテム会話
Entry.EnglishText: First Time Item Conversation
